message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $13000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10000, and that's my final offer. I really like the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10000 is a bit below my target price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $11500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $11500 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10000, and that's my final offer. I'm willing to walk away if that's not acceptable to you.
